sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
div(class="form-todo form-group")
	p
		v-text-field(label="Nome", name="name", v-model="name")
	p
		v-text-field(label="Email", name="mail", v-model="email")
	p
		v-text-field(label="Telefone", name="tel", v-model="tel")
	p
		v-file-input(:rules="rules", accept="image/png, image/jpeg, image/bmp", placeholder="", prepend-icon="mdi-camera", label="Avatar", v-model="avatar")
	p
		v-btn(class="ma-2", color="primary", dark, v-on:click="addUser")
			v-icon(left, dark) mdi-plus
			span Adicionar
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data () {
		return {
			name: '',
			email: '',
			tel: '',
			avatar: '',
		}
	},

	methods: {
		addUser() {
			console.log(this.avatar)

			if(!this.name.trim())
				return

			this.$emit('add-user', {
				name : this.name,
				email: this.email,
				tel: this.tel,
				avatar: this.avatar
			})

			this.name = ''
			this.email = ''
			this.tel = ''
			this.avatar = ''
		},
	}
}
</script>
